entry.def: Tights are a piece of clothing, usually worn by women and girls. They are usually made of nylon and cover the hips, legs and feet.

entry.tran: (通常指舞蹈演员、杂技演员或人们运动时穿的)紧身衣
entry.def: Tights are a piece of tight clothing, usually worn by dancers, acrobats, or people in exercise classes, and covering the hips and each leg.

means.word_mean: 1. skintight knit hose covering the body from the waist to the feet worn by acrobats and dancers and as stockings by women and girls
2. man's garment of the 16th and 17th centuries; worn with a doublet

sentences.en: It just wasn’t my day:the car wouldn’t start,I was late for the meeting,and to top it all I laddered my tights!
